question_text: You need to set up payment terms for buying groups. /nWhich two actions should you perform? /nEach correct answer presents part of the solution. /nNOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

items.A: Set up payment terms with a value of CM+20D for the due date calculation.
items.B: Assign the payment terms to the customer price group.
items.C: Assign the payment terms to the customer.
items.D: Assign the payment terms to the customer posting group.
items.E: Set up payment terms with a value of D20 for the due date calculation.
